name: Josh Simmons (@josh@josh.tel)
summary:
@sphakos@toot.cat "It's almost like neuro-spicy folks like to hang out with each other..."

Right?! ðŸ˜‚ Seems to happen on other dimensions of identity too! Like, genuinely shocking numbers of people I've formed strong ties with have ultimately been diagnosed as neurospicy, and/or with EDS, and/or come out as queer/trans.

Love that we find each other even before we self-identify these ways.

(...so yea I'm definitely thinking a lot more about autism rn...)
